snippet.title: ALIEN XENOBLASTER - Announcement Trailer (DEMO AVAILABLE!!)
snippet.description:
Trailer for our upcoming arcade themed game starring Blunt, a pissed off alien on her way to eliminate an entire planet full of aliens because they look stupid. Is there really more of a reason needed? As she sets bait with cardboard cutouts of hot women, battle your way through 2 worlds and 2 bosses with an additional hard mode, and an available cameo character!

DOWNLOAD THE DEMO: https://menacegnarly.itch.io/alien-xenoblaster
JOIN THE DISCORD: https://discord.gg/sG6ssd9ZVY
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/alienracismgame

Promotional art done by Bryce Carrington: https://twitter.com/brycecarringto5

WIP logo by Miles Torres (Aka Daypeecone):
https://twitter.com/daypeecone

Annalynn by Cruise Elroy
Pizza Tower by Pizza Tower Guy
